name: Queue Session
description: Allow players to join a matchmaking queue and match with other players.  It supports 2 players per match, and if the queue is empty the first player will have to wait.

gameFunctions.name: Join Queue
gameFunctions.description: This puts a player in the queue.

gameFunctions.name: Set Match Or Wait
gameFunctions.description: If there is already a player in the queue will match them and pass one two players.  If the queue is empty, will put the current player in the queue.
